ygData.subject: Re: Membership restrictions?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Ok, consider me off the list. If anyone would like to, feel free to drop me a line, either in email or on Tarrew Marr. -Brent aka Iustus
ygData.messageBody:
>Hi Brent,
>
>The EQ_women list is only for women to join and participate in.
>
>I will not enforce this rule in any way, because there is no point in
>trying to enforce it--anyone can get around it. I don't want to pretend
>that this can be enforced, so I won't remove you from the list, or even
>ask you to leave, I'll just say that that's the rule.
>
>Digests from the list are publicly readable from www.onelist.com.
>
>- Christina

Ok, consider me off the list. If anyone would like to, feel free to drop
me a line, either in email or on Tarrew Marr.

-Brent aka Iustus
